meanings: money paid for drinks, (술 마실 돈) money for drinking[a drink]

vlive.korean: 이거 진짜 차 한 대 값 아니야, 이거? Doesn't this cost as much as a car? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: Doesn't this cost as much as a car?

vlive.korean: [SF9: 저는 잘 재울 수 있어요] 지금 V LIVE 제목 값하죠 여러분? [SF9: I can put you to sleep well] My V LIVE is true to its title, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] (우당탕) 타지야~ 미안해~ 나도 어쩔 수 없는 셒구인가봐~ (우당탕) (JAEYOON talking about newly-coined word)
vlive.english: [SF9: I can put you to sleep well] My V LIVE is true to its title, right?

vlive.korean: 요즘엔 필름값이 안 들어서 괜찮아요 - 그렇죠 - 그래요? It's okay since they don't use film. - Right. - Right? 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
vlive.english: It's okay since they don't use film. - Right. - Right?

vlive.korean: 이름값하는 남자~ Guy who fulfills his name. 듣기 View video VICTON : 깜짝부이앱
이거는 값을 매길 수 없죠! I can't put a price on this! 듣기 View video CIX : CIX HYUNSUK BIRTHDAY V LIVE
vlive.english: I can't put a price on this!

examples.korean: We paid for the car by/in instalments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 차 값을 할부로 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The price is payable in monthly instalments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 값은 월부로 지불할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The price is payable in monthly instalments. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The paintings were sold for absurdly high prices. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 그림들은 터무니없이 고가[비싼 값]에 팔렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The paintings were sold for absurdly high prices. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cost of your uniform will be deducted from your wages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 유니폼 값은 당신 급여에서 공제될 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cost of your uniform will be deducted from your wages. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: All the best bargains were snapped up within hours. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 값이 싸고 아주 좋은 물건들은 몇 시간 안에 다 잡아채[사] 가고 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
